    Improving NCBI GEO submissions of scRNA-seq data

clustifyr: Classifier for Single-cell RNA-seq Using Cell Clusters

Source: R/clustifyR-package.R
clustifyr-package.Rd

Package designed to aid in classifying cells from single-cell RNA sequencing data using external reference data (e.g., bulk RNA-seq, scRNA-seq, microarray, gene lists). A variety of correlation based methods and gene list enrichment methods are provided to assist cell type assignment.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/rnabioco/clustifyr

  • https://rnabioco.github.io/clustifyr/
